name: Purple Heart Amethyst Necklace
description:
Glittering, natural jasper quartz druzy heart pendant hangs freely on a gold cable chain. 

This pendant is gorgeous! It's a perfect light purple amethyst color with amazing crystallization and a gold electroplated edging - the back is left open to allow light to pass through. 

It is the largest of the hearts that I have in stock, measuring approximately 1 1/4 tall x 1 3/8" wide. There are only 3 available so don't wait!!! 

The chain on this necklace measures 16" long and is has an 2" but can be made to 18incges upon request. It is finished with a spring clasp closure. Would make a wonderful Valentine's Day present for someone you love. 

Please note that jasper quartz druzy is a natural gemstone, and as such, natural imperfections are to be expected and add to its charm! 

Comes thoughtfully packaged in a 1937 by Charlotte signature velvet bag

name: "Her" by 1937 Limited Edition Awareness Bracelet
description:
The "Her" by 1937 Limited Edition Awareness bracelet is now here in very limited quantities.  This gorgeous statement piece is handcrafted using a variety of beads from our favorite collection of 1937 by Charlotte beads.

A portion of the proceeds from the "Her" by 1937 signature bracelet September sales will be donated to the Susan B. Komen foundation in honor of Breast Cancer Awareness month.

Represent all of the "Her's" in your life with this limited edition piece

name: 1937 Hammered Cross Chain Bracelet
description:
What a perfect way to break up the monotony of a beaded wrist!  I handcrafted this bracelet to complement all of your 1937 Arm Candy!  

This hammered cross is linked together with a gold or silver plated chain & secured with a spring clasp.  One size fits all. The spring clasp can be connected to any link on the bracelet for a customized fit.

This listing is ONLY for the hammered cross bracelet. She loves Roses & High Maintenance bracelets sold separately.

name: She Loves Roses
description:
Rose gold is surely the way to every girl's heart.  These marbled shell patterend beads are delicately complemented by a rose gold pave' accent bead.  The rose gold love charm is dramatic & feminine at the same time.

Comes thoughtfully wrapped in 1937 by Charlotte signature style & ready for gift giving.

name: A Wing & a Prayer
description: Breast Cancer Awareness has never been more beautiful.  These black & pink tribal print beads make a bold statement of their own, but we added the antique oversized wing charm to kick it up a notch.  Drama for a cause!

name: Haute Wings of Hope
description:
The second addition to our 2012 Breast Cancer collection has arrived!  These beautiful hot pink beads are adorned with a pink pave crystal wing & matching pink pave beads.  Perfect to stack along with our other BCA beauties!

** Limited Quantities** while supplies last

name: Pretty Skullies
description:
Pretty Girls wear Pretty Skullies.  

Ornate rose skulls are surrounded by VINTAGE vinyl disk beads from Nigeria and perfectly accented with a matching pave crystal bead.  Wear alone or stack with you #Shop1937 faves!

colors: Pink, Goldenrod, Green **Choose gold or silver skulls*

PLEASE INCLUDE WRIST SIZE IN THE "MESSAGE" SECTION AT CHECKOUT!!!

description:

Your choice of 3 inch or 2.5 inch hoops. 

These hoops are large, but not heavy.

name: Black Hollywood
description:
Strikingly bold faceted black beads are accented with tiny gold disk beads & a large pave crystal is used as the focal piece. STRIKING & eye catching from any direction!  This is a unisex piece....

**Limited quantities available**

Comes thoughtfully wrapped in 1937 by Charlotte signature style & ready for gift giving.

name: Bad Boyz
description:
Skulls and Crystals for all of the Bad Boyz with a bit of style.  Your choice of Red carved skulls with a red & gunmetal pave crystal accent, or select the black carved skulls with a black & silver pave crystal accent.

Can't choose? Select BOTH (set of 2; 1 each color) for extra savings!  


Comes thoughtfully wrapped in 1937 by Charlotte signature style & ready for gift giving.

name: Queen
description:
Purple is the color of royalty & these beautiful cracked gemstone beads are accented with 2 bronze crowns and a crystal pave bead.  A perfect way to represent yourself as a queen or show the queen in your life how much she is loved!

Comes beautifully wrapped in signature 1937 by Charlotte style & ready for gift giving.

name: King
description:
Kings are meant to be honored.  Honor yourself or the man you call your KING with this beautiful black onyx bracelet accented with a single bronze crown.

Comes thoughtfully wrapped in 1937 by Charlotte signature style & ready for gift giving.

name: Tribal Princess
description:
This is an ABSOLUTE must have 1937 Creation!!

Add a fun pop of color to your wrist with these super chic & meaningful beaded bracelets.The colorful African trade beads are created in Africa & give these bracelets that cool tribal vibe.

The silver elongated pave' crystal bar gives these vintage beads an extra dose of CHIC & FLAIR! Just enough bling for a Tribal Princess!!

African Trade beads were once used as currency in trade between Africans & Europeans.  These beads were traded in Africa for gold, coffee & natural resources.  **Due to the vintage nature of these beads, limited quantities are available**

Measures approx 7.5 inches long.  Length can be adjusted; please leave me a note in the message to seller.

Comes thoughtfully wrapped in 1937 by Charlotte signature style & ready for gift giving.

name: Grapes of Wrath
description:
Stunningly PURPLE!!! 

If you are a purple lover, then this is a MUST for your collection!

These are the most amazingly rich purple beads that we have had in stock!  So stunning, that simplicity is a must.  Silver pave cross bar will adorn the top of your wrist, while a small silver pave bead is the perfect accent along the back.

Measures approx 7.5 inches long.  Length can be adjusted; please leave me a note in the message to seller.

Comes thoughtfully wrapped in 1937 by Charlotte signature style & ready for gift giving.

name: Tainted Promises (Limited Edition)
description:
Looking for an eye catcher? This bracelet screams DRAMA! Tainted promises definitely won't go un-noticed.  

 Black, white & grey mix gemstone beads accented by a pave crystal charm with an open cross cut-out.

Black is associated with power, elegance, and mystery.

**Only a limited number of these pieces will be created/sold. Once they are gone, they are gone.

Measures approx 7.5 inches long.  Length can be adjusted; please leave me a note in the message to seller.

Comes thoughtfully wrapped in 1937 by Charlotte signature style & ready for gift giving.

name: Pink-A-Boo
description:
Pink-a-boo!  We all see you!!

Pink gemstones can be used to promote love, self-worth, order and protection from violence or aggression. Wear your pink gemstones around your daily to stimulate love and beauty.

Pink gemstone beads with a silver pave crystal bead & pink accented Eye of Horus pave crystal charm. 

Measures approx 7.5 inches long.  Length can be adjusted; please leave me a note in the message to seller.

name: Wipe Me Down
description:
Blue is the color of the sky and sea. It is often associated with depth and stability. It symbolizes trust, loyalty, wisdom, confidence, intelligence, faith, truth, and heaven.

Light blue is associated with health, healing, tranquility, understanding, and softness.
Dark blue represents knowledge, power, integrity, and seriousness.

Measures approx 7.5 inches long.  Length can be adjusted; please leave me a note in the message to seller.

Comes thoughtfully wrapped in 1937 by Charlotte signature style & ready for gift giving.

Unisex.  Fully adjustable.
